duties_responsibilities.duty: Guide patients to prioritize their treatment and provide scheduling options with a sense of urgency
Interact with patients professionally and personably to create a great first impression of the practice
Form connections during consultations and discover optimal payment plans for each patient with accurate and positive communication skills
Maintain office flow in an energetic and exciting work environment by promoting flexibility, understanding, scheduling, rescheduling, and using the proper callback system
Prepare patient charts, collect co-payments, and verify insurance with strong organizational skills

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years in healthcare field or fast-paced service environment
